Hello! I'm working on a quest game and I have found how to set the background image for the game overall, but I have been unable to figure out how to actually change the background image. I know such a thing is possible because I've seen it done, but I'm just unsure of how to do so. Essentially, I would like to "Visual Novel" style have a different background image for each room. 

I've found some posts from way back on here mentioning it but some of what was said I didn't understand or didn't work when I tried it. I have a feeling it's something I'll have to do manually in the code rather than the UI so I'll probably need careful instructions because I'm incredibly unfamiliar with directly using code. Can anyone help me figure this out? Thank you!
